title: The Double helix
creator_credit: Anvil Films, EFVA and Peter De Normanville
brief_description: Part of the Nobel Laureates series. Shows the work of several scientists in determining the structure of deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA). Uses animated diagrams to illustrate the structure of DNA. Discusses the significance of DNA in all living organisms. Suitable for upper secondary level.
